recipesJson.name: Cucumber Fields
recipesJson.author: Echodub
recipesJson.description:
a idea based around a POG recipe, i added cucumber and lychee to change it to slightly greenish, exotic range
i made two version, one with 1% sweetener and a lower one, i actually do like the one with 1% a bit more as it pushes to flavors to a brighter edge, although for some it's a bit too high.. lower it to your preferred level
